name: For the Honor of Goblin Clan
name_original: For the Honor of Goblin Clan
description:
To play use AWSD or arrow keys!

--------------------------------------------

- If, by any chance, your gold pot / gold nugget get's randomly teleported into the games border, it will be teleported once again, to a different position. If that happens, don't worry, your game is not glitching!

- If, by any chance, leaderboard isn't working, you can play the game on this website, so your score saves and everyone can see it! 

Have fun! :) Also, do not forget to post the highest score you have gotten in the comments, because on itch.io the leaderboard does not work!!! :(

- Made by Geekos team!
